chw-etraining.title: CHW eTraining Platform UI Design
chw-etraining.bio:
High-impact UI design for a training platform.
Focused on storytelling and accessibility.
Crafted with mobile-first strategy.

about.html:
The CHW eTraining platform is a healthcare UI design project crafted to streamline remote learning for community health workers. Its design emphasizes accessibility, responsive interaction, and visual storytelling.

  • Optimized for low-bandwidth environments
  • Clean, scannable content structure
  • Figma handoff for dev integration

features.title: Modular UI System
features.description: Designed with reusable components to streamline future scaling.

features.title: Accessible Design
features.description: Compliant with WCAG guidelines, ARIA labels, and keyboard navigation.

features.title: Mobile-first Layout
features.description: Prioritized performance and usability for mobile devices.

chw-etraining.problem_statement: CHW Global needed a training platform that could educate field health workers in underserved regions with limited internet access and device capabilities.
chw-etraining.solution: Designed a lightweight, accessible UI system that delivers high readability, modular structure, and seamless navigation across mobile devices.
chw-etraining.output: A developer-ready Figma prototype with all assets, ARIA annotations, and component documentation for smooth development handoff.
